resources.string: Zoom in on the price chart
Highlight real-time addition of new trades
Shows device specific metrics for debugging
Clears user\'s data without signing them out
I\'m using STEX for trading cryptocurrencies! Try it out for yourself: %s

Your order has been successfully cancelled!
The image has been successfully saved!

Swipe left to show a button to cancel an order
Permissions not granted! Unable to proceed.
The server is not responding! Please try again later.
You are sending this request way too many times! Please try again in a minute.
Login session expired! Please re-login to renew the session.
This market is currently disabled! Please try again later.
The total amount should be at least %s!
You don\'t have enough %s on your balance!
Can\'t get currency wallet information. Please try again later.
The depositing is disabled for this currency. Please try again later.
Cannot retrieve deposit address data. Please try again later.
Cannot retrieve withdrawal data. Please try again later.
Nothing to withdraw since the balance is empty!
You must create a wallet address first, then the withdrawal will be available.
The entered amount is too small.
The maximum number of open orders with the same price can not exceed 10!
You cannot user your current PIN as your new PIN.
Failed to initialize the fingerprint scanner. Please try again later.
There have been too many failed attempts. %s
You have incorrectly entered your PIN code %d times.\n\nTry again in 30 seconds.
The email client was not found! %s.
The browser client was not found! %s.
The sharing client was not found! %s.
The provided URL is either empty or malformed!
The provided email address is empty!
The provided email address is invalid!
The provided password confirmation is empty!
The provided passwords do not match. Please check them and try again.
The provided code is invalid. Please double-check it and try again.
The email or password is invalid. Please double-check them and try again.
The provided referral code is invalid!
Please accept STEX\'s terms of use!
Please confirm that you are over 21 years old!
The user with the specified email address cannot be found. Please double-check the email and try again.
Oops! Something went wrong while fetching the wallets.
The provided total amount is invalid!
The provided value of the \"%s\" parameter is invalid!
The withdrawal amount should be at least %s!
The withdrawal amount should be no more than %s!
The entered amount exceeds your current balance!
The withdrawal either has already been processed or the provided link is invalid!
Oops! Something went wrong! Please try again.
The provided stop price is invalid!
The withdrawal either has already been confirmed or cancelled!
The provided withdrawal address is invalid. Please double-check it and try again.
You do not have enough %s on your balance to pay for a withdrawal fee.
Looks like the system you are withdrawing to requires the destination tag parameter. Please fill it in and try again.
Unfortunately, the connection could not be established to the STEX servers. Please try again later.
Please verify your account by following the instructions in the email we sent you
The verification email has been successfully resent. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions in the message to verify your account.
We sent you a one-time code to your email. Please check your inbox to get the code to enter below. Make sure to check the spam folder if you can’t see our email.
We sent you a one-time code to your mobile phone. Check the incoming SMS to get the code to enter below.
Did not receive our SMS message?
You have two-factor authentication enabled. Please enter your six-digit code provided by the authenticator you use.
I\'ve lost my device and want to disable the two-factor authentication?
If you have lost your device and want to disable the two-factor authentication, please contact the support.
If you have not received our SMS message in 5 minutes, our system will automatically call you and spell you verification a code, so be prepared to write down the code when the time comes.
Your account has been successfully verified. Please log in now.
The login session has expired. Please log in again.
Hello. I\'ve lost my device and cannot provide two-factor authentication codes now during the login. Could you help me by disabling it in my settings? The email of the STEX account is %s.

The referral program allows users to receive 25% discount of the trading fee forever. To achieve that, new users need to enter a referral code during registration so that a user the referral code belongs to may receive the aforementioned discount.\n\nIf you do not have or do not wish to enter one, then simply leave that field empty.
An email with a confirmation link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions to confirm your email
Please enter your email address and we\'ll send you an email with a link to reset your password.
An email with a password reset link has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions in the email to reset your password.
An email with a password reset link has been successfully resent. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions in the message to reset your password.
Your password has been successfully changed. Please log into your account.
Please check your inbox and follow the instructions in the email to reset your password

Noticed a bug or have a suggestion?

Please, let us know. We value your feedback greatly and where possible will look to use it to improve our app.

Help us make this app even better!
Did not find the answer to your question in our FAQ? \n\nPlease, contact us. We will do our best to answer your question.

STEX is one of the most easy-to-use trading platforms worldwide. Simplicity and comfort of our marketing platform allows you to invest in any business all over the world. Just in one click buy or sell any your coins, assets or tokens on major crypto platforms and do your business online.

In order to be able to withdraw funds, please verify your account by Cryptonomica on our website. This offers protection from fraudulent activities, reduction of trading fees, and simplifies the recovery of your account in case you lose access to it.
Unfortunately, creating deposits and withdrawals for this currency is currently enabled only on our website.
The withdrawal confirmation email has been successfully resent. Please check your inbox and follow the instructions in the message.
The withdrawal has been successfully confirmed.
Are you sure you want to cancel this withdrawal?
The withdrawal has been successfully cancelled.
Warning!\n\nSend only %s to this address. Sending any other currency to this address may result in the loss of your deposit.
Hint: click to copy or long click to show QR code
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Prevents the screen from turning off
Are you sure you want to restore to default settings?
No fingerprints have been registered to this device yet. Do you want to register a fingerprint now?
Are you sure you want to disable fingerprint authentication?
Downloads new data as soon as it is available
Allows you to enable or disable the animation of price and depth charts
Zooms in on the latest candle sticks of the price chart instead of displaying them all at once
Emphasizes real-time updates of an orderbook by highlighting the changed data
Emphasizes real-time addition of new trades by highlighting them
Allows you to replace your current PIN code with a new one
Allows you to authenticate using your fingerprint
Forces authentication to be performed when the app starts even if the session has not expired
Divides numbers with many digits into groups using the grouping separator
Your decimal separator was automatically updated to the %1$s since you have selected the %2$s as your new grouping separator.
Your grouping separator was automatically updated to the %1$s since you have selected the %2$s as your new decimal separator.
Are you sure you want to cancel this order?
Looks like your order has already been processed and, therefore, could not be cancelled. Please double-check the status of the order and try again.
The PIN you have selected is extremely common and may be easily guessed by someone with access to your phone. Would you like to use this PIN anyway?
Please authenticate by entering your PIN code instead.
Use your fingerprint for faster and easier authentication
Please authenticate using your PIN instead.
An email with a confirmation link has been sent to your email address

You are creating a stop-limit order, but the lowest asking price %1$s is above the stop-price %2$s you specified, meaning that the order will be processed immediately after creation. Do you want to proceed?

You are creating a stop-limit order, but the highest bidding price %1$s is below the stop-price %2$s you specified, meaning that the order will be processed immediately after creation. Do you want to proceed?
Find answers to your technical questions.
Please, provide full information about a problem in your request.
Do you want to sign out?
If you forgot your PIN and want to reset it, you will have to re-login and create a new PIN.

Make sure to familiarize yourself with %s.
	Due to AMLD 5 since January 1, 2020 verification will be required for all the Customers.
	You can still use the platform without verification until December 31, 2019.

	Do not delay verification till the last day, make it on time.

Make sure to familiarize yourself with amendment 5 to the Directive (EU) 2018/843 of the European Parliament and of the Council
	 Due to AMLD 5 since January 1, 2020 verification is mandatory for all the Customers. Verification is also required for anti-fraud protection measures for STEX and its Customers. 
	 Verify your account to unlock trading and withdrawal functions.
Unfortunately, this feature is currently in development. Sorry for temporary inconveniences.
Invite your friend and get 25% of his trading fee forever.
Referral bonus is credited once a day. %s
IMPORTANT: STEX reserves the right to change the terms of the referral program at any time at its sole discretion.
Insert referral code your friend provided to you
The referral code has been successfully processed!

Place a QR image inside the square
This function is currently under development. At the moment it is only available through the website (desktop mode).
You did not have any news
Price should be a positive number
You can have only one alert that has a lower price than the current price
You can have only one alert that has a higher price than the current price
Currency price %s is already less than or equal to the requested alert price
Currency price %s is already greater than or equal to the requested alert price
An alert for a given currency and a comparison already exists. You can create only one.
Push notifications sent by STEX are currently disabled in your settings. Allow enabling to send you Notifications?
